long_description: If you are a serious roadie, you measure what you eat, you obsess about your training regimen, you read everything you can about cycling and you were born to win-you're a JetFluid Pro rider. PowerTuned technology provides smooth, realistic accelerations and inertia, and a real-world feel for a wide range of riders and riding types. Cool operating temperature delivers long-lasting performance and a stable progressive power curve. Provides smooth, quiet and realistic resistance. Ensures consistent resistance throughout the entire ride regardless of ride type. Frame accommodates quick installation and removal of bike via single-side mount; resistance unit locks in place for transport and storage. Frame levels easily for riding on all surfaces.
short_description: If you are a serious roadie, you measure what you eat, you obsess about your training regimen, you read everything you can about cycling and you were born to win-you're a JetFluid Pro rider.
